hotels.title: Busan Buzzing City Escape with Three Onsite Restaurants
hotels.description: South Korea's second-largest city is cradled by mountains, gleaming beaches and simmering hot springs, and there's no better way to explore than from your sophisticated city base at Avani Central Busan Hotel. When it comes to dining, there are three onsite restaurants to satisfy any craving: light bites and breezy cocktails at The Garden, sophisticated international bites from The Cube and panoramic views with a side of upscale dining at The Sky restaurant.
